023
024package org.opt4j.operators.diversity;
025
026import org.opt4j.core.genotype.BooleanGenotype;
027
028/**
029 * The {@link DiversityBooleanFraction} calculates the {@link Diversity} between
030 * two {@link BooleanGenotype}s by calculating the fraction of different vector
031 * entries.
032 * 
033 * @author glass
034 * 
035 */
036public class DiversityBooleanFraction implements DiversityBoolean {
037
038        /*
039         * (non-Javadoc)
040         * 
041         * @see
042         * org.opt4j.operator.diversity.Diversity#diversity(org.opt4j.core.Genotype,
043         * org.opt4j.core.Genotype)
044         */
045        @Override
046        public double diversity(BooleanGenotype a, BooleanGenotype b) {
047
048                double diversity = 0;
049                for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {
050                        if (a.get(i) != b.get(i)) {
051                                diversity++;
052                        }
053                }
054
055                return diversity / a.size();
056
057        }
058
059}
